detail_desc: Tailored trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a regular waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Wellingtons with a relief pattern and small appliqué on the shaft. The shaft has a canvas edge with a drawstring and plastic fastener. Reflective strip at the top. Pile linings and chunky soles.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and a sailor collar with a decorative bow at the front.

Sleeveless playsuit in a woven viscose blend with a deep V-neck front and back and wide flounce trim at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a concealed zip at the back.

Shirt in cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved shirt in a woven cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, front and back pockets and straight hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Elastic hairband with an appliqué at the front and elastication at the back.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a wrapover front and high waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a light jacquard weave with a V-neck, collar and ties at the front. Dropped shoulders, narrow cuffs and a round hem. Unlined.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Top in jersey crêpe with a lace yoke, round neckline, cut-out section at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in stripe-print cotton jersey with a text print and striped ribbing around the neckline.

Jacquard-weave top with a square neckline and short puff sleeves with a silicone trim at the shoulders and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning. Concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a print motif on the front and long sleeves.
Top in viscose crêpe jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, flounced sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
Slides in soft leather with adjustable straps, moulded suede insoles and patterned soles.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist and wide, tapered legs with decorative seams at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Lined hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Relaxed-fit jacket in washed cotton denim with worn details. Collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, concealed side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly organic.
Elastic bracelets with wooden beads.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a collar and a V-neck opening at the front. Unlined.
Shorts in small hole mesh with a print on one leg. Covered elastication at the waist, front pockets with trims down the sides, and short slits in the sides of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.
Twill cap with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, gently fitted dress in velour with sequined embroidery, a concealed zip in the back, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Lined.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, belt in braided imitation suede, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Sleeveless, fitted, knee-length jacket dress in a linen and viscose weave with notch lapels and a wrapover front. Two concealed press-studs, a detachable D-ring belt at the waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and a short slit at the back. Lined.
Set with a cotton jersey top and tulle skirt. Top with a print motif on the front and long sleeves. Lined skirt with concealed elastication and gathers at the waist.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in chiffon crêpe with smocking at the top, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a smocked hem.

Short jacket in sturdy canvas with a fleece-lined hood with a collar, drawstring and foldable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs and a hook and loop fastening down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, one zipped pocket concealed by the wind flap and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining and polyester filling.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned weave in a slightly wider style with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Mules in imitation suede with square toes. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Cropped vest top in ribbed jersey with metal press-studs down the front.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed trim on each short side.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined swim suit with appliqués in the shape of flowers at the top and at the hip, narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Half-length sleeves with slits and ties, and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative pompoms on the front.
Long-sleeved faux fur top.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
A pair of large metal hoop earrings decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 6 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with shoulder straps that have a sewn-on bow. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-shaped opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Pleat at the back of the neck, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short, fitted dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a round, slightly deeper neckline, long sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Top in a textured weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Fitted at the top with a seam under the bust and wide flare to the hem. Lined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with short sleeves.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, narrow ties at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with smocked cuffs. Visible seam at the front, an embroidered text motif at the back and slits in the sides.
Shorts in softly draping weave made from a silk blend in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder (no press-studs in sizes 18M-4Y).
Fitted top in soft, patterned modal jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Jumper in a cotton knit containing some cashmere with a stand-up collar and zip at the top.

Top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections at the sides and down the sleeves and a hood with a wrapover front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with wide shoulder straps, a straight cut at the top and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Pyjamas in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and appliqué on the front. Top with a velour front and long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a soft silk and cotton blend with a collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides of the hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a gentle V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with decorative tie details at the top.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide elasticated ribbing at the waist and straight, wide legs with roll-edge hems.
